headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://maps.googleapis.com https://*.supabase.co https://www.googletagmanager.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.supabase.co https://maps.googleapis.com https://www.google-analytics.com; img-src 'self' data: https://maps.googleapis.com https://maps.gstatic.com https://*.googleusercontent.com https://*.supabase.co https://www.google-analytics.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none';
